meta.author: Eren Inan Canpolat
meta.description: Makes the HTML results into a string. Useful for pipes.yahoo.com

select.execute: var q = y.query('select * from html where url=@url and xpath=@xpath and charset=@charset limit 1',{url:url,xpath:xpath,charset:charset}); var myresults = q.results; response.object = myresults.toString();
